scripts.deploy_contracts_local: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy_local.js
scripts.deploy_contracts_rinkeby: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy_contracts_mainnet: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.verify: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat verify --network mainnet 0x600a4446094C341693C415E6743567b9bfc8a4A8 'Anchor Certificates' 'ACS' '0xaF69610ea9ddc95883f97a6a3171d52165b69B03' '1624888800' '1627308000'
